documentation.text: @notice Restrict access to only the admin address
@notice Allow users to stake ETH (must be >= minStakeAmount)
@notice Allow users to unstake their full balance

devdoc.details: Deployed on Hardhat; accepts random ETH values from 3.0 to 3.5 during testing

params.user: The address whose stake will be reduced

returns._0: The amount of ETH staked by that address

unstake().notice: Allow users to unstake their full balance
